Class DungeonMap

java.lang.Object
world.DungeonMap
public class DungeonMap extends Object
Week 13: DungeonMap as Static Manager (Option B+ Hybrid Approach) ✅ KEPT: All static methods for backward compatibility ✅ NEW: Delegates to activeMap (polymorphic behavior) This allows different map layouts without changing 20+ files that use DungeonMap.isWalkable(), DungeonMap.getTile(), etc. Usage: - LevelLoader calls DungeonMap.setActiveMap(new ForestMapLayout()) - All other code continues using DungeonMap.isWalkable() etc.
